;Many people are curious about what car insurance coverage is right for them. You should take a look at your policy at least once a year and determine if it is still right for your situation or if perhaps you should increase or decrease the coverage. Younger people have less assets and are therefore not as likely to need a lot of liability coverage. You will want to stay well above minimum state requirements, however, since those are extremely low. Your coverage should reflect your net worth. You always want enough liability insurance to cover your assets. There are many different types of coverage available and being informed on what each one represents is a great way to make sure you are getting exactly the right policy for yourself.
